AbstractClient - Class in client.communication
The AbstractClient contains all the methods necessary to set up the client side of a client-server architecture.
AbstractClient(String, int) - Constructor for class client.communication.AbstractClient
Constructs the client.
AbstractConnectionFactory - Class in server.communication
The AbstractConnectionFactory is an abstract class that must be subclassed when one want to use a subclass of ConnectionToClient class.
AbstractConnectionFactory() - Constructor for class server.communication.AbstractConnectionFactory
 
AbstractServer - Class in server.communication
The AbstractServer class maintains a thread that waits for connection attempts from clients.
AbstractServer(int) - Constructor for class server.communication.AbstractServer
Constructs a new server.
